McPairPotential Class Reference
Pair Potentials

Detailed Description

A PairPotential for MC simulations (abstract).

virtual double atomEnergy ( const Atom &  atom) const [pure virtual]

Calculate the nonbonded pair energy for one Atom.

Parameters:
atomAtom object of interest
Returns:
nonbonded pair potential energy of atom

Implemented in McPairPotentialImpl< Interaction >.

virtual double moleculeEnergy ( const Molecule &  molecule) const [pure virtual]

Calculate the nonbonded pair energy for an entire Molecule.

The return value is the change in total pair potential upon inserting or removing a molecule. This is the sum of all inter-molecular pair interactions involving atoms of this molecule, plus an intramolecular contribution in which each pair is counted only once.

Parameters:
moleculeMolecule object of interest
Returns:
nonbonded pair potential energy of molecule

Implemented in McPairPotentialImpl< Interaction >.

Referenced by HomopolymerSemiGrandMove::move().

void buildCellList ( )

Build the CellList with current configuration.

Calls CellList::clear() to clear the CellList, then adds every Atom in this System. Each Atom position is shifted into the primary box by Boundary::shift() before being added.

void updateAtomCell ( Atom &  atom) [inline]

Update the cell list to reflect a new position.

Use this to update the cell list after an Atom position has already been assigned a new value.

Parameters:
atomAtom object whose position has been modified.

Definition at line 156 of file McPairPotential.h.

Referenced by RingTetraRebridgeMove::move(), RingOctaRebridgeMove::move(), and CfbRingRebridgeMove::move().

void moveAtom ( Atom &  atom,
const Vector &  position 
) [inline]

Move an Atom position, and update the CellList.

On output, atom.position() is reset to to position, and the new position is recorded in the CellList. This is equivalent to atom.position() = position and then updateAtomCell(atom).

Parameters:
atomAtom object of interest
positionnew position vector
